Subject: Hot Rod, Epyon, Khonkolor
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...



Several armed men came out of a large doorway, each aiming towards Hot Rod, 
Epyon, and Khonkolor.

A mucus covered slug-like being slowly came over to the three.

"Welcome, follow these seven beings and they will lead you into the city 
limits and the arenas.

(I'll assume you follow them to save time)

The several armed IGL soldiers walked through the doorway, after a few cycles 
of walking a huge civilian area was visible.  It could be compared to ancient 
feudal markets on Earth from 500 AD to 1500 AD.

After exiting the civilian area, it is clear that it is a more militarized 
zone, cameras, laser turrets, and troops being numerous.  Stopping at large 
gates that looked like potcullises the soldiers waited as every single of the 
numerous ones were opening.

Names were above each one.  From Ares to Daemos to Hot Rod, every entree of 
Round One's name was above where the portcullises had been.

"Please find your name and enter through."
